Text.Page:
Reports from the second level tell of tall, black-feathered beings working with the naga. Am I the only one who's thinking mekonari? Of all the things we didn't need....

Kill one of these {@LinkCreature:42#1010#black-feathered things} and bring me a souvenir, will you? We need to know for sure what we're up against.

Mekonari, just as I suspected. But why are they here? I wish I knew more about them. I should have paid better attention at the academy. Go back and hunt {@LinkCreature:42#1010#mekonari} until you find out. I'll make it worth your while, of course.
What are the mekonari up to? Have you found out yet?
